message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $9,500.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $7,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we split the difference and settle on $8,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $8,500 is still a bit above my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $8,000?
